function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Passive exercise behavior in young people","Impact":"Negative impact on physical health and mental well-being","Mitigation":"Tailoring exercise intensity for different age groups","Technologies":"Smartphone applications and wearable sensors for monitoring","People":"Young people between 18 and 29 years old","Owner":"Health authorities and fitness professionals"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on mental health and exercise behaviors","Impact":"Reduced exercise intensity and decreased physical activity","Mitigation":"Tailoring exercise intensity for different age groups","Technologies":"Smartphone applications and wearable sensors for monitoring","People":"Adults, children, and adolescents","Owner":"Health authorities and fitness professionals"},{"Description":"Dependence on remote or face-to-face supervision for exercise","Impact":"Reduction in exercise stimulation and potential increase in depressive symptoms","Mitigation":"Utilizing remote supervision and mentoring programs, such as smartphone applications and wearable sensors","Technologies":"Smartphone applications and wearable sensors for monitoring","People":"Individuals engaging in supervised exercise","Owner":"Fitness professionals and health care providers"}]}
